mapper.select: SELECT t.task_no taskNo , t.task_title taskTitle , tl.project_no projectNo FROM task t INNER JOIN task_list tl ON t.tasklist_no = tl.tasklist_no WHERE t.task_upper_no = #{taskNo}

SELECT t1.task_no taskNo , t1.task_title taskTitle , t2.task_upper_no taskUpperNo , t2.task_no lowerTaskNo , tl.project_no projectNo FROM task t1 LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT * FROM task WHERE task_upper_no = #{taskNo} ) t2 ON t1.task_no = t2.task_no INNER JOIN task_list tl ON t1.tasklist_no = tl.tasklist_no WHERE tl.project_no = #{projectNo} AND t1.task_no != #{taskNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE task SET task_upper_no = NULL , update_date = NOW() WHERE task_no = #{taskNo}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM task WHERE task_upper_no IN ( SELECT task_no FROM ( SELECT task_no FROM task WHERE task_upper_no = #{taskNo} ) a )
